name: IBM* Bluemix Quickstart
description:
This project template allows you to quickly test the IBM* Bluemix.
It will read the temperature from the Grove Temperature Sensor then send it to the IBM* Bluemix.

First steps:
Go to https://quickstart.internetofthings.ibmcloud.com/#/ and enter a unique device ID (e.g. the MAC address of your device). 
Replace the placeholder {DEVICE_ID} by this value.
Run the example and check the results at:
https://quickstart.internetofthings.ibmcloud.com/#/device/{DEVICE_ID}/sensor/

* Other names and brands may be claimed as the property of others.
service_provider_description: IBM Bluemix is a cloud platform as as service. It supports several programming languages and services as well as integated DevOps to build, run deploy, and manage applications on the cloud.
